items.sentence: Both Tom and Mary plan to study music in Boston.
I learned how to write my name when I was three.
Tom didn\'t seem to be aware that Mary did that.
Tom didn\'t seem to understand your explanation.
Tom didn\'t stop smoking, so Mary left the room.
I asked Tom to wait for me at the train station.
I asked him not to play the piano late at night.
I can be here for a while longer if you need me.
I can do that with one hand tied behind my back.
Tom said he didn\'t want to go drinking with us.
Tom said that he didn\'t really plan to do that.
Give me another couple of days to think it over.
I told Tom that I never wanted to see him again.
I wish I could get Tom to show me how to juggle.
I wonder whether Tom did that last night or not.
I want you to stay in Boston until October 20th.
I was about to leave, but Tom came, so I stayed.
You\'ve already decided not to go, haven\'t you?
I suspect that Tom and Mary aren\'t very hungry.
I think I shouldn\'t have told Tom where I live.
